channel.title: Port fowarding
channel.description:

item.title: Port fowarding
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“usernamelol, post:1, topic:20196”]Need to know what to put into ext ports please someone help :\ and also how to find my static ip after i set iit up.

[/quote]

Ok there is two “ext. ports” boxes. IN THE FIRST AND SECOND BOXES put “43594”. Then check the box “Protocol TCP”. Now put in the last few digits of your computer’s IP address (not your internet IP address, but your computer one), in the next box to the right. Then check the box at the end and click “Apply”. Reply if this works and enjoy! =)

~Mod Taharok

Read full topic

item.title: Port fowarding
item.dc:creator: @usernamelol .Fusion
item.description:
@usernamelol wrote:

[quote=“M4G3OWNS, post:5, topic:20196”]rofl just in the ext. port boxes put 80 in both and tick both protocol boxes and tick the enABLE BOX ON WICH LINE U ENTERERD STUFF IN (oops soz bout caps :D)
o yea and in program name box just call it ur server name or wuteva[/quote]
K thanks. if works ***++
